events.text: After Buddy gets kicked out of the arena, he hears the sounds of a struggle and Ferret calling out to him from an alley.
Shut up and quit struggling, you little weasel. The boss wants a word with you.
I’m no weasel, you ingrate! My kind are the most sophisticated of the Mustelidae. Not that the likes of you would know anything about sophistication. Buddy!
Leave Ferret alone, Leo. He hasn’t done anything to you.
Buddy the Wolverine. What’re you doing playing hero? Last I heard, the boss pays your salary just like he does mine.
You’re behind the times, Leo. Big Star and I are done. Get your paws off Ferret.
Or what? I don’t believe you’re as good as they say. Everyone knows Big Star’s matches are rigged.
Keen to find out, you overgrown kitten? I win, Ferret goes free.
